fehd.ADR_EN: 12/F., THE WORLD TRADE CENTRE, 280 GLOUCESTER ROAD, CAUSEWAY BAY, HONG KONG
fehd.ADR_TC: 香港銅鑼灣告士打道280號世界貿易中心12樓

geocode_en.formatted_address: Hong Kong, 銅鑼灣告士打道280號世貿中心12樓

geocode_tc.formatted_address: 香港銅鑼灣告士打道280號世貿中心12樓

result.adr_address: Hong Kong, Causeway Bay, 銅鑼灣告士打道280號世貿中心12樓
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, Causeway Bay, 銅鑼灣告士打道280號世貿中心12樓
result.name: Dragon King Restaurant

reviews.text:
🥢 🍵 🥟 🍡 🍤 🍜

The Dragon King Restaurant ilocated at The World Trade Centre in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong is extremely nice.  It demands elegance, because of its decor.  
Very subtle but in your face.

The tables are so far apart from your neighbors that you can really enjoy your meal without having to hear other people's conversations, and they sort of have the tables in cubicles with drapes.  The chairs are strong and solid, very comfortable.

The food is excellent and fresh, and the food is properly cooked.  The Dim Sums were very tasty with the proper seasoning, and the noodle dish was quite nice.

The staff have to be professional to say the least, but they attempted to nice and friendly, but when a restaurant is busy, you try not to detract the help for a smile. 

When you are in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong, do check out The Dragon King Restaurant.  You will be delighted and have a good time.
Food quality good, but very poor service today
A restaurant with a nice view with some local dim sums! The food is okay and meets the local expectations. Definitely a little pricier for the quality of food you are getting.
All good. Taste, price and view.

We had a couple of meals here. For lunch, we were just the 2 of us - reservations are highly encouraged as it's BUSY! At first, after we showed up without a reservation at 12 PM for lunch, we were told a rough estimate of 1.40 PM! Fortunately in 5 minutes we got lucky, but the restaurant was jam packed with locals. All foods were excellent quality and very reasonably priced. Don't forget the nice views on the harbor.

Second time we went in the evening for dinner, with friends (total 4 of us). This time it was somewhat less crazy-busy, but it was a good sign that the overwhelming majority of patrons seemed local as opposed to tourists. Different menus! See attached just one page for appetizers, but the menu was thoroughly impressive... A full page just on sea cucumbers, a full page just shark fin dishes, another full page of fish maw dishes. The price was MUCH higher than the lunch menu + we were a little bit disappointed that some of our favorites from the lunch menu weren't available in the evening, but it was not a big deal.

Overall, a definitely recommended authentic Chinese restaurant!

result.name: 龍皇酒家

reviews.text:
🥢 🍵 🥟 🍡 🍤 🍜

The Dragon King Restaurant ilocated at The World Trade Centre in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong is extremely nice.  It demands elegance, because of its decor.  
Very subtle but in your face.

The tables are so far apart from your neighbors that you can really enjoy your meal without having to hear other people's conversations, and they sort of have the tables in cubicles with drapes.  The chairs are strong and solid, very comfortable.

The food is excellent and fresh, and the food is properly cooked.  The Dim Sums were very tasty with the proper seasoning, and the noodle dish was quite nice.

The staff have to be professional to say the least, but they attempted to nice and friendly, but when a restaurant is busy, you try not to detract the help for a smile. 

When you are in Causeway Bay, Hong Kong, do check out The Dragon King Restaurant.  You will be delighted and have a good time.
位於銅鑼灣世貿中心12樓，位置適中，加上環境幽静，點心款式多且美味，小菜精緻，不失為一所和朋友相聚的好地方。各位員工很有禮貌，上下一心，實是管理階層的成功效果，值得推薦。
食物好，招待不週因非常欠缺人手！冲茶遞水人多，落單待应小！今晚燒肉冇！烧鹅又冇！連乳鸽都话冇！莫非現在龍皇只做龍虾魚翅？
食物很好，可以睇到尖東海景！
廣東風味不再？今晚多個菜式帶辣。
